blockchain-platform
*******************


Description
===========

Blockchain Platform Instance Description.


Available Commands
==================

* change-compartment

* create

* create-osn

* create-peer

* delete

* delete-osn

* delete-peer

* get

* list

* list-blockchain-platform-patches

* preview-scale

* scale

* start

* stop

* update

* update-osn

* update-peer

* upgrade
